players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was killed, so someone is mafia. I suspect Bob because no one else has spoken. Let's watch his actions."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. The mafia could be someone else among us. Let's keep an eye on everyone."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe you, Alice, did. Let's investigate that."
Diana: "I investigated Bob; he is mafia and killed Charlie. He keeps denying. Vote him to stop the killings."
You: "Diana's investigation points to Bob. He denies but never killed Charlie. He’s the only suspect. Let's vote Bob to stop him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so someone is mafia. I suspect Bob because no one else has spoken. Let's watch his actions."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. The mafia could be someone else among us. Let's keep an eye on everyone."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe you, Alice, did. Let's investigate that."
Diana: "I investigated Bob; he is mafia and killed Charlie. He keeps denying. Vote him to stop the killings."
Alice: "Diana's investigation points to Bob. He denies but never killed Charlie. He’s the only suspect. Let's vote Bob to stop him."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was killed, so someone is mafia. I suspect Bob because no one else has spoken. Let's watch his actions."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. The mafia could be someone else among us. Let's keep an eye on everyone."
You: "I investigated Bob and found he's mafia. He killed Charlie."
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Maybe you, Alice, did. Let's investigate that."
You: "I investigated Bob; he is mafia and killed Charlie. He keeps denying. Vote him to stop the killings."
Alice: "Diana's investigation points to Bob. He denies but never killed Charlie. He’s the only suspect. Let's vote Bob to stop him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
